[!INCLUDE[vs2017banner](../assembler/inline/includes/vs2017banner.md)]

-   [RUNTIME\_FUNCTION \(Struct\)](../build/struct-runtime-function.md)  
  
-   [UNWIND\_INFO \(Struct\)](../build/struct-unwind-info.md)  
  
-   [UNWIND\_CODE \(Struct\)](../build/struct-unwind-code.md)  
  
-   [Structs encadenados de información de desenredo](../build/chained-unwind-info-structures.md)
